replies.msg:
小小spec：
Netgear r7800
CPU1: Qualcomm IPQ8065 (1.7 GHz, 2 cores)
FLASH: 128 MiB (Micron MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E)
RAM: 512 MiB (Nanya NT5CC128M16IP-DI × 2)
WI1 chip1: Qualcomm Atheros QCA9984
WI1 802dot11 protocols: an+ac
WI2 chip1: Qualcomm Atheros QCA9984
WI2 802dot11 protocols: bgn
ETH chip1: Qualcomm IPQ8065

Asus RT-86AC
CPU1: Broadcom BCM4906 (1.8 GHz, 2 cores)
FLASH: 256 MiB (Macronix NAND)
RAM: 512 MiB (Micron MT41K256M16TW-107)
WI1 chip1: Broadcom BCM4366E
WI1 802dot11 protocols: an+ac
WI2 chip1: Broadcom BCM4365E
WI2 802dot11 protocols: bgn
ETH chip1: Broadcom BCM4906


netgear 用高通 cpu，asus 用博通cpu，唯一差别係 Asus Flash 大 Netgear Flash 多128MB, both are good routers, really depend on your budget, I would prefer Broadcom CPU, which is Asus, because WIFI chipset and CPU, Broadcom is king, Qualcomm is good in mobile telephone baseband chipset, not in WIFI chipset. 易唔易set？both are easy to set. dont worry.

quote.msg:
依行字點解？
750+2167Mbps
即係上載得750？
100mb寬頻用唔用得晒？

replies.msg: 100Mbps 係WAN speed, 連接Internet嘅，750Mbps 同 2167 Mbps 依哋係wifi LAN speed, 係電腦同router或其他電腦嘅speed, 兩樣嘢黎 你個100Mbps 係用晒㗎喇

quote.msg:
